item.title: Story time: What future could look like
item.description: Hello, is this Pizzeria Palermo? No, sir! This is Google pizzeria. Oh, I must have dialed the wrong number? No sir, Google bought the pizzeria. Ah, okay! They my order is… Sir, would you like to order the usual? The usual? Do you know me? According to our caller ID, you’ve ordered a medium crusted sausage pizza thirty times in the past.
